data.actual_result: The channel where the invite was originally for stays checkmarked until you save the changes.
data.expected_result: The check-mark should have moved to the new channel that you selected for the invite.
data.short_description: Check-mark does not move when changing location of server invite.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server invite (using button under server name, not from a channel). - Tap the invite link to go to it's settings. - Tap the Instant Invite Channel. - Select any channel that does not have a check-mark. - Tap the Instant Invite Channel again.
